| ---------- | ---------- | ------------- | --------- | ------- |

| `max`      | `max`      | Max value     | `number`  | `100`   |
| `min`      | `min`      | Min value     | `number`  | `0`     |
| `step`     | `step`     | Step          | `number`  | `1`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | Current value | `number`  | `0`     |
